markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ember's Eyes](/Feats.aspx?ID=2553) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 102 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your eyes blaze with inner flame. You gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416), or you gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) if your ancestry already has low-light vision.

**Special** If your ancestry has neither low-light vision nor darkvision, you can take this ancestry feat a second time to gain darkvision. You can't retrain out of this feat.
name: Ember's Eyes
